issue.title: [C++] Create Buffer implementation that takes ownership for the memory from a std::string via std::move
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3250](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3250). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are instances where it is useful to be able retain ownership to a `std::string` owned by another as a `arrow::Buffer`, so we could have an interface like `StlStringBuffer(std::string&& input)` and transfer the memory that way
